App.Title: Used Cars Data Analysis with Statistical and Data Visualization Elements

Header.Title: Information
Header.Description1: Project titled 'Used Cars Data Analysis with Statistical and Data Visualization Elements' using the Angular framework with a .Net backend. The project utilizes a dataset
Header.Description2: to demonstrate the capabilities of the prepared solution. Elements presented on each diagram are editable.

Notifications.Add: A new chart has been added

Descriptions.bar: A bar chart represents data as rectangular bars of varying heights.
Descriptions.line: A line chart displays data as a series of points connected by lines, allowing trends to be seen.
Descriptions.pie: A pie chart shows proportions between categories as slices of a circle.
Descriptions.doughnut: A doughnut chart is similar to a pie chart but has a hollow center, making data visualization clearer.
